meanings.definition: A person or thing that is remarkable or excellent.
meanings.sent1: My friend Sarah is a real doozer when it comes to solving puzzles.
meanings.sent2: That new movie we watched last night was a real doozer!
meanings.sent3: The doozer of a cake my grandma baked disappeared in minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her performance on stage was a doozer, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The sunset over the ocean was a doozer, painting the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Something that is particularly outstanding or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display on the Fourth of July was a real doozer this year.
meanings.sent2: The new roller coaster at the theme park is a total doozer!
meanings.sent3: The doozer of a storm last night knocked down a few trees in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His magic trick was a doozer, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The diamond ring she received was a doozer, sparkling in the sunlight.
